column2: A new Webpack boilerplate with hot reloading React components, and error handling on module and component level.

column5:
Merge pull request #129 from gaearon/gaearon-patch-2

Deprecate in favor of React Hot Loader 3
Deprecate in favor of React Hot Loader 3

Revert "Remove NoErrorsPlugin until webpack-hot-middleware learns to display syntax error overlay after reload as well"

This reverts commit c1b0521e5fdcc57066477d6143e74db177e27be3.
Remove NoErrorsPlugin until webpack-hot-middleware learns to display syntax error overlay after reload as well
